scenario_text.value: What in the world...?
Lookit the size of this thing!

Wow... Are these ruins?
Hmm...these look pretty old.
Say, any idea what this is?

Not a clue... I’ve never heard of anything
like this.

It’s right behind the shrine. Prohibited
or not, I should’ve heard it mentioned...
Or so you’d think, and yet...
Don’t tell me Miu went in there?

There’s no way a girl would go into a place
like this...

That’s where you’re wrong. If it’s her we’re
talking about, I guarantee she went inside.

I bet you Saki ran right in after her, huh?
All “ooo” this and “ahhh” that.
That...does seem to fit her M. O.
Miuuu!
Come ON, what was I JUST talking about?!
(I should do something about this...)
Don’t go alone, Kaito!
Let’s split up to look!
Can’t lose track of him!
Don’t go alone!
Wait, Kaito! Don’t go off on your own!

I can’t just wait around here! What if
something happens to Miu?!
Yeesh... All right, guess we have no choice.
Let’s split up!

Kaito’s gone to the shrine, so we ought to
split up! We’re sure to find something.

Wait, Takuma! Splitting up’s a bad move.
We’ll all just get lost!

Ah, yeah that’s true. Okay, everyone stick
together!
Don’t say that now!

Now’s not the time to say that! We have to
find them all as soon as possible!

And if Kaito goes off on his own, we’ll lose
track of him, too!
Ulp... Well sure, that’s true.
Let’s go, too!
Heeey, Sakiii! Yoohoo, Ryoooooo!
If you hear us, please answer!
